txt.en:
'I imagine you are probably wondering what a hobbit such as myself is doing so far from home. I have the honour of being apprenticed to the master chef, Lyn Woodsorrel. She sent me forth into the Wildwood to collect ingredients for the first ever Feast of the Wildwood.

'But, alas! You know how that went. I am so grateful for all the help you've given me, and am loath to ask for more... but ask I shall! I desperately need your help gathering ingredients, or the feast will be ruined! I will be ruined!

'We need meat from the game animals in Wildwood. Please bring me cuts of boar, moose, and bear.

'Also have I heard tell of terrible walking trees in these woods! My master insists that, and I do quote, 'Huorn are rotten to the core, but their bark produces the perfect flavour when smoking meat and fish!' If you come across any of these monstrous walking plants, please bring me their bark.'
Minda is in a camp in the southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Minda Heathertoes.

'I do not know how I could do this without you, [placeholder]! Well, I could not do this without you at all. I would have to hang my head in shame and return a failure.\n\n'I can cross off so many ingredients from my list now! You have saved the feast and my apprenticeship!'
'So many dishes, so many ingredients! My future as a chef is doomed if I return empty handed!'

'We need meat from the game animals in Wildwood. Please bring me cuts of boar, moose, and bear.

'Also have I heard tell of terrible walking trees in these woods! My master insists that, and I do quote, 'Huorn are rotten to the core, but their bark produces the perfect flavour when smoking meat and fish!' If you come across any of these monstrous walking plants, please bring me their bark.

'Stomper and me are heading south. I have heard there is a merchant over this hill who has a supply of a special spice I require.'
Minda Heathertoes' pony and waggon have been located, but she still has a job to do: collecting ingredients for her master's feast.
Feast ingredients can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nMinda Heathertoes needs help gathering ingredients for a grand feast.
